Name: Demon heart
About the game: Welcome to Demon heart. Accompany Syael in her journey to the other world where demons live on floating islands. Find out what happened on every island. Investigate who and why did this. Defeat island masters and talk to them. Meet the demon royal family. Which side will you choose? Will you find demons' heart delicious? In this game you will find: *5 unique islands *Bosses that demand a specific approach to each one *Puzzles with unobvious solutions *Arcade machine without winning *Completely different characters *Heaps of treasure and cakes *Store where nothing will be sold to you *WALKING *Three different endings
Meta Title: Demon heart: Nov 30, 2020, Jiabisu and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Demon heart? Check out the release date (Nov 30, 2020), developer insights from Jiabisu, and a complete game summary.
